exploreUrl:
<js>
//ä¸€è¡Œä¸ªæ•°
var nums = 4 ;
//åˆ†éš”ç¬¦
var separator = '::'

//æ ‡é¢˜::é“¾æ¥::ä¸€è¡Œä¸ªæ•°::åˆ†ç±»

all=["æ ‡   ç­¾::::1",
" NP ::np::4::a",
"ç„å¹»::ç„å¹»::4::a",
"å¥‡å¹»::å¥‡å¹»::4::a",
"ç©¿è¶Š::ç©¿è¶Š::4::a",
"æ ¡å›­::æ ¡å›­::4::a",
" B E ::BE::4::a",
"å‡ºè½¨::å‡ºè½¨::4::a",
"å¤ä»£::å¤ä»£::4::a",
"å¤è¨€::å¤è¨€::4::a",
"ç°ä»£::ç°ä»£::4::a",
"ABO::ABO::4::a",
"æ¸…æ°´::æ¸…æ°´::4::a",
"ç”œæ–‡::ç”œæ–‡::4::a",
"åæ”»::åæ”»::4::a",
"çˆ½æ–‡::çˆ½æ–‡::4::a",
"èŒåœº::èŒåœº::4::a",
"é«˜ h::é«˜h::4::a",
"ä¸»æ”»::ä¸»æ”»::4::a",
"äº’æ”»::äº’æ”»::4::a",
"å¿«ç©¿::å¿«ç©¿::4::a"
];

//@å¤©å¤©gg@é…·å®‰ ä¸‹é¢ä¸è¦åŠ¨
function parse(data){
	let args=data.split(separator);
	let title = args[0],url=args[1],num=nums;
	
	//é“¾æ¥ç”Ÿæˆ
	 let u=/^\d+/.test(url)?"https://www.haitangsoushu.com/s/'+url+'/{{page}}/":url;
 try {num = args[2] }catch(e){}
 try {tag = args[3];
 u=tag=="a"?'https://www.haitangsoushu.com/s/'+url+'/{{page}}/':u;

 }catch(e){}
	return [title, u, num]
	}

function FlexBox(title, url, num){
		 let obj={};
		 obj.style={},obj.title=title,obj.url=url?url:'',obj.style['layout_flexGrow']=1;
	//æ•°å€¼è®¾å®š
	let data={1:1,2:0.4,3:0.25,4:0.2,5:0.15,7:0.1,10:0.05};
obj.style['layout_flexBasisPercent']=data[num]
		return obj
		}
result=JSON.stringify(all.map(data=>{
	let args=parse(data);
	return FlexBox.apply(null, args)
	}))
</js>

href='';text='';
for(i in list){
href=href+list[i].select('a:eq(1)').attr('href')+'\n';
text=text+'ã€'+i+'ã€‘'+list[i].html()+'\n';
}

result='æ¢æºåˆ—è¡¨ï¼ˆç‚¹å‡»è®¾ç½®ä¹¦ç±å˜é‡ï¼Œè¾“å…¥åºå·ï¼Œç¡®è®¤ååˆ·æ–°ï¼Œå¯æ›´æ”¹å¯¹åº”çš„æºï¼Œé»˜è®¤ä¸º0ï¼‰\n'+text+'\n'+laiyuan+'\n--------------\n'+intro

ruleBookInfo.init:
<js>
var javaImport = new JavaImporter();
javaImport.importPackage(
    Packages.java.lang,
    Packages.javax.crypto.spec,
    Packages.javax.crypto,
    Packages.android.util
);

with(javaImport){
  function decode(word){
      let key=SecretKeySpec(java.base64DecodeToByteArray("UP8XDHB/5Z29QGFovGSxyPwn9egkxEazAPz6Uoo80Zc="),"AES");
      let iv=IvParameterSpec(java.base64DecodeToByteArray("AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA=="));
      let chipher=Cipher.getInstance("AES/CBC/PKCS5Padding");
      let bytes=Base64.decode(String(word).getBytes(),2);
      chipher.init(2,key,iv);
      return String(chipher.doFinal(bytes));
    }
}
decode(result)
</js>

ruleExplore.bookList:
<js>
java.put('login_token','f37b91ca9d1348f6c307315433a71209')
java.put('account','è¥¿æŸš78264469064')
var javaImport = new JavaImporter();
javaImport.importPackage(
    Packages.java.lang,
    Packages.javax.crypto.spec,
    Packages.javax.crypto,
    Packages.android.util
);

with(javaImport){
  function encode(word){
      let key=SecretKeySpec(java.base64DecodeToByteArray("UP8XDHB/5Z29QGFovGSxyPwn9egkxEazAPz6Uoo80Zc="),"AES");
      let iv=IvParameterSpec(java.base64DecodeToByteArray("AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA=="));
      let chipher=Cipher.getInstance("AES/CBC/PKCS5Padding");
      chipher.init(1,key,iv);
      return java.encodeURI(Base64.encodeToString(chipher.doFinal(String(word).getBytes()),Base64.NO_WRAP));
    }
  function decode(word){
      let key=SecretKeySpec(java.base64DecodeToByteArray("UP8XDHB/5Z29QGFovGSxyPwn9egkxEazAPz6Uoo80Zc="),"AES");
      let iv=IvParameterSpec(java.base64DecodeToByteArray("AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA=="));
      let chipher=Cipher.getInstance("AES/CBC/PKCS5Padding");
      let bytes=Base64.decode(String(word).getBytes(),2);
      chipher.init(2,key,iv);
      return String(chipher.doFinal(bytes));
    }
}
category_type=baseUrl.match(/category_type=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/category_type=(\d+)/)[1]:""
order=baseUrl.match(/order=(.+?)&/)?baseUrl.match(/order=(.+?)&/)[1]:""
is_paid=baseUrl.match(/is_paid=(\d)&/)?baseUrl.match(/is_paid=(\d)&/)[1]:""
up_status=baseUrl.match(/up_status=(\d)&/)?baseUrl.match(/up_status=(\d)&/)[1]:""

java.log(JSON.stringify(jsonObj))
option={"method":"POST","body":"secret_content="+encodeURIComponent(encode(JSON.stringify(jsonObj)))}
url="https://xiyou.lfunv.com/bookcity/get_rank_book_list,"+JSON.stringify(option)
response=decode(java.ajax(url))

// æ‰“å°è§£å¯†ç»“æœ
java.log(JSON.stringify(JSON.parse(response)))
response
</js>
